Title: AN ACT TO GRANT AN EXTENSION OF THIRTY DAYS TO THE TAYABAS LIGHT AND POWER COMPANY, INCORPORATED, TO COMPLY WITH THE REQUIREMENTS OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-SIX HUNDRED AND FORTY-NINE GRANTING THE SAID COMPANY A FRANCHISE FOR ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER, IN TAYABAS, PROVINCE OF TAYABAS.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 218, November 29, 1936 ]
AN ACT TO GRANT AN EXTENSION OF THIRTY DAYS TO THE TAYABAS LIGHT AND POWER COMPANY, INCORPORATED, TO COMPLY WITH THE REQUIREMENTS OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-SIX HUNDRED AND FORTY-NINE GRANTING THE SAID COMPANY A FRANCHISE FOR ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER, IN TAYABAS, PROVINCE OF TAYABAS.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The Tayabas Light and Power Company is granted an extension of thirty days, from the date of the approval of this Act, to comply with the terms and conditions set forth in Act Numbered Thirty-six hundred and forty-nine relative to the acceptance of the franchise, the deposit and other requirements under the said Act granting the Tayabas Light and Power Company, Incorporated, a franchise to install and operate an electric plant in the municipality of Tayabas, Province of Tayabas: Provided, however, That the said franchise shall be subject to the limitations provided in the Constitution of the Philippines.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, November 29, 1936.
